attributes.action: to ultimatly reject all alternative voting propersitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have no doubt that the only real intention of such a voting system is simply to muddy the voting waters and actually to remove the power of direct personal choice away from the voter as I can guarantee local citizens would not then have the privilege of being able to remove such poorly elected people out of office.
Technically it would be worse type of so called democracy than proportional representation which only truly allows for party politics and low local candidate representational choice. 
If you think it matters who just as much as what you are voting in to office. 
Sign Here...
Alternatively Deliberate and maybe you'll decide that having other options is good for things like public opinion never the less you will not end up under AV in a general election with all the best bits of different people. Actually you'll get one MP with a name representing you in Parliament.
